data.title: WTF do all the Heart Emojis Mean? You Won't Believe What We Found Out!
data.meta_description: Today I had the desire to understand the question of how my diverse group of peers perceived the #emojis I use online. Naturally, as an #engineer, I started playing with several prompts in OpenAI's #gpt3 playground to determine the Universal definitions of each Heart Emoji.
data.text:
Today I had the desire to understand the question of how my diverse group of peers perceived the #emojis I use online. Naturally, as an #engineer, I started playing with several prompts in OpenAI 's #gpt3 playground to determine the Universal definitions of each Heart Emoji.

Based on; the Heart emojis on my #ios keyboard, and Emojipedia

1â¤ï¸, 2 ğŸ§¡, 3ğŸ’›, 3ğŸ’š, 4ğŸ’™, 5ğŸ’œ, 6ğŸ’Ÿ, 7ğŸ–¤, 8ğŸ¤, 9ğŸ¤, 10ğŸ’”, 11â¤ï¸ ğŸ”¥, 12â¤ï¸ ğŸ©¹, 13â£ï¸, 14ğŸ’•, 15ğŸ’, 16ğŸ’“, 17ğŸ’—, 18ğŸ’–, 19ğŸ’˜, 20ğŸ’

It quickly became apparent that the heart emojis had different definitions based on geographical and demographic context. Scroll down to the appendix below to view sample [Prompt] results

The key insight and takeaway for me was,

"It's time for us to create a new keyboard plug-in that provides a Context-based Look-up to help understand each other better. Imagine having the ability to double tap on a word or emoji in online text and see a personalised definition based on the author's world views."

Imagine there are three initial layers to this double tap;

Global definition curated by linguistic experts and up/down voted by the Wisdom of the Crowd

Local definition based on geography/demographics/subcultures/domains

Personalised definition based on the author's world views

Moch use-case; I feel resonance with a purple heart emoji

{Action: Double Tap ğŸ’œ}

Global ğŸ’œ can symbolise spirit, mystery, magic, or royalty.

Local ğŸ’œ interpretations include expressing love or admiration, indicating sympathy or condolence, or simply indicating something is very special or important.

Personal (Luke-ldw-108) ğŸ’œ to me, represents an abundant love and appreciation for humanity and all living things.

Please take our quick poll and kindly reshare the article to your network!

Vote using the LinkedIn reaction buttons or leave a comment below!

#curious = I am curious! I want to be a part of it!

I grant consent for anyone to run with this idea and leverage a #dao to bring it to life.

Appendix for various OpenAI prompts curated using Grammarly

Prompt

Provide the most commonly used definitions for the 20 different heart emojis above.

Prompt

Provide the most commonly used Western Hemisphere definitions for each of the 20 different heart emojis.

1â¤ï¸, 2 ğŸ§¡, 3ğŸ’›, 3ğŸ’š, 4ğŸ’™, 5ğŸ’œ, 6ğŸ’Ÿ, 7ğŸ–¤, 8ğŸ¤, 9ğŸ¤, 10ğŸ’”, 11â¤ï¸ ğŸ”¥, 12â¤ï¸ ğŸ©¹, 13â£ï¸, 14ğŸ’•, 15ğŸ’, 16ğŸ’“, 17ğŸ’—, 18ğŸ’–, 19ğŸ’˜, 20ğŸ’

A heart emoji typically signifies love, affection, or admiration.

A heart emoji can also represent caring, compassion or be used as a general expression of positivity.

A yellow or gold heart emoji may express happiness, joy, or friendship.

A green heart emoji typically signifies envy or jealousy.

A blue heart emoji means trust, loyalty, or faithfulness.

A purple or violet heart emoji can symbolise mystery, magic, or royalty.

A black heart emoji signifies hatred, darkness, or evil.

A white heart emoji represents purity, cleanliness, or innocence.

A broken heart emoji means sadness, grief, or heartache.

A heart with an arrow through it typically signifies being in love or deeply infatuated with someone.

A heart on fire emoji typically represents passion, intense desire, or being head-over-heels in love.

A heart with bandages emoji typically signifies being heartbroken or feeling pain from a failed relationship.

A glowing heart emoji means love, admiration, or appreciation.

A two hearts emoji indicates being in love or deeply infatuated with someone.

A beating heart emoji signifies passion, excitement, or intense emotion.

A heart with wings emoji typically means being free from love or being in a state of ecstasy.

A growing heart emoji typically represents increasing love or affection.

A heart with flowers emoji typically represents appreciation or thanking someone for their kind actions.

A heart with an arrow emoji typically means being in love or deeply infatuated with someone.

A heart with a ribbon emoji typically signifies being in love or showing appreciation for someone.
